item.title: Portfolio Performance
item.description: Portfolio Performance The objective of the portfolio is to obtain sustainable returns with moderate drawdowns. In this page, I will be comparing my portfolio performance against the World benchmark. I would like to note that this is not a perfect comparison because my portfolio contains bonds, gold and real estate asset classes too. These tend to underperform against equities in the very long run but it acts as useful hedge during severe market corrections.
